abstract: With the final approval of financial regulatory reform, banks have moved quickly to turn the rules to their advantage by adding new fees and revamping their derivatives operations.
snippet: With the final approval of financial regulatory reform, banks have moved quickly to turn the rules to their advantage by adding new fees and revamping their derivatives operations.
lead_paragraph: The ink is not even dry on the new rules for Wall Street, and already, the bankers are a step ahead of everyone else.

headline.main: Banks Seek to Keep Profits as New Oversight Rules Loom
headline.print_headline: Cut Back, Banks See a Chance to Grow

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Nelson D. Schwartz

abstract: In an encouraging sign, almost a third of JPMorgan’s second-quarter profit came from a $1.5 billion gain on releasing reserves for loan losses.
snippet: In an encouraging sign, almost a third of JPMorgan’s second-quarter profit came from a $1.5 billion gain on releasing reserves for loan losses.
lead_paragraph: Don’t count on a rebound in business to lift bank stocks — but they might not need it. That’s the message to glean from JPMorgan’s second-quarter results. Granted, the bank’s performance was hardly disastrous, especially considering the recent slowdown in trading across the industry. But almost a third of the bank’s profit came from a $1.5 billion gain on releasing reserves for loan losses.

headline.main: An Encouraging Sign in Loan Loss Reserves
headline.print_headline: An Encouraging Sign in Loan Loss Reserves

abstract: MSCI, the data analysis company, announced on Thursday that it has signed a deal to buy Measurisk from JPMorgan Chase, in a move that will bring together two hedge fund risk reporting providers, Hedge Funds Review reported.
snippet: MSCI, the data analysis company, announced on Thursday that it has signed a deal to buy Measurisk from JPMorgan Chase, in a move that will bring together two hedge fund risk reporting providers, Hedge Funds Review reported.
lead_paragraph: MSCI, the data analysis company, announced on Thursday that it has signed a deal to buy Measurisk from JPMorgan Chase, in a move that will bring together two hedge fund risk reporting providers, Hedge Funds Review reported.

headline.main: In Measurisk Deal, MSCI Beefs Up Hedge Fund Tools

abstract: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, sounded rather upbeat on Friday about his bank’s ability to absorb losses in revenue caused by the new financial regulations passed by Congress.
snippet: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, sounded rather upbeat on Friday about his bank’s ability to absorb losses in revenue caused by the new financial regulations passed by Congress.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, sounded rather upbeat on Friday about his bank’s ability to absorb losses in revenue caused by the new financial regulations passed by Congress, in contrast to the feelings of heavy concern at rival banks like JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America.

headline.main: Pandit Says Citigroup Can Absorb Curbs on Fees
